gitup: Git push, but sets the remote upstream if one isn't found
hash: A command to hash files and directories (hash --help)
initcommit: Initial commit for a git repo
jsuck: A cheat sheet for quick JS things
math: Runs the arguments as a JS command - be careful!
openhere: Run from a VSCode terminal to reuse the VSCode window
phpmyadmin: Spawns a PHPMyAdmin Docker instance to read MySQL databases
pwd: Gets the current pwd, '-slash' to double slash
setview: Supposed to switch monitor inputs through HDMI CEC
size: Gets the size of the objects passed on the commandline
svgtopng: Alias to 'inkscape' converting SVG to PNG
token: Script to generate 'tokens' (non-crypto secure random strings)
wintolinpath: Script to convert Windows paths to linux paths
wsadb: Connects the WSA Android instance with ADB
zen: Opens the VSCode Zen profile (minimal VSCode)
